verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Faithful Lord Jesus,
crucified as Son of Man,
God hath exalted above all spheres
Thou who are holy,
righteous, yet lowly
By faith wilt dwell within our hearts

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Wondrous Lord Jesus,
Thou who art Immanuel,
Sent as God's Christ to be Lord of all
Thee we would glorify,
praise, bless and magnify
Thy worthy name forever more.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Anointed Lord Jesus,
oil of joy is flowing
Down to Thy body from Thy head
The Father's chosen came,
given the highest name
Lord Jesus Christ, the Son of God

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Honored Lord Jesus,
Seated at the Father's side
Worshipped and loved be all who care
Made head of the new race,
for all who know Thy grace,
Desire of nations, we adores

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Sovereign Lord Jesus!
Offspring of King David
O royal Lion of Judah's tribe
Price from Thy humble birth,
heir of the universe
Crowned King of Kings
and Lord of Lords!

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Majestic Lord Jesus,
O Thou Radiant Daystar,
Risen in hearts that fear Thy name
Herald of the new day,
all earth beneath Thy sway
Come quickly bright and morning star

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Come Thou Lord Jesus!
Gracious Heavenly Bridegroom
The church is eager to see Thy face
Find Thy bride in array,
Thy glory to display
Thus satisfy Thy Father's heart
